messages.subject: RE: [nihontostudy] LA Shinsa 2004 ??
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Rich, Not a rumor, the next real NTHK shinsa is scheduled for LA next year, most likely early September. Gordon ... From: alchemyst
messages.messageBody:
Hi Rich,



Not a rumor, the next real NTHK shinsa is scheduled for LA next year, most
likely early September.



Gordon



-----Original Message-----
From: alchemyst [mailto:alchemyst@...]
Sent: Tuesday, July 22, 2003 1:39 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] LA Shinsa 2004 ??



I've heard rumors of a shinsa in LA next year. Anyone
care to elaborate or share details?

Rich
